3.27.20 // 12pm–4pm // The Internet

Virtual Open Studio

Use this as a space to meet up with friends that you might not get to see otherwise. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be there and is happy to offer critique, technical advice, and general help.

Meeting will be on Zoom, email Michael McDermott for the link.
